events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your software development skills detailed in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
You have passed the initial screening for the Software Engineer role and we would like to schedule a technical interview with you soon.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the next round of interviews. We are excited to move forward with your application.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior engineering team members.
You completed the technical interview successfully and impressed our team with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you on May 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
You successfully completed the HR interview, and the panel was impressed with your communication skills and alignment with our values.
We are pleased to extend an official offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the attached offer letter and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer. We are thrilled to have you join our engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been officially recorded. Welcome aboard as our newest Software Engineer!
The onboarding process has begun. You will receive further instructions on orientation sessions, equipment setup, and team introductions.
The hiring process is now complete. We look forward to your contributions as a full member of our engineering department.
